text: G-Unit is a hip hop group from New York. It consists of rappers 50 Cent, Lloyd Banks and Tony Yayo. They are signed to 50 Cent's record label G-Unit Records. They have released several albums. The have also engaged in feuds with other musicans in the industry including Ja Rule, Game and Young Buck. Category:2000s American music groups Category:2010s American music groups Category:American hip hop bands Category:Musical groups from New York (state)
title: G-Unit
